EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 13_TCO WP
EmailTemplate.subject: What you need to know about TCO and cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> TCO analysis proves savings with private-hybrid clouds Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’ve talked about how moving to an enterprise cloud and network transformation are changing the enterprise game. However, I’m sure one of the questions at top of mind has been, “what will it all cost?”
Check out our white paper, “Moving from a legacy to a cloud environment <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2210.Whats.your.TCO.for.moving.to.the.cloud.html.V2.html?did=d000000000aq&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 13b-tcoWP&utm_term=finance]]>,” to get answers to this and other Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) questions. It details how our IDC validated, TCO model was built and how flexible analysis can address different requirements and environments.
I hope that you enjoy this white paper! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
